name: A Daily Struggle
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 41. The theme was to mix two incompatible genres, so I did Clicker/Survival horror. It's not like a typical survival horror, however. It may not be running from monsters in an unknown area, but depression is basically a waking nightmare for me. And it takes just as much effort to survive.

I wanted to convey how stressful and terrifying it is to constantly be battling my own head just perform basic human functions. Depression is a hard and scary thing to live with, so I hope I get my message across with this game.

Thank you for playing :)
